landingPage.title: I’m a product designer with full-stack development experience, looking to join a technology-driven organization.

thesis.title: The end of Thesis
thesis.content: The exploration of the relationship between human and technology in the near future by going across theories, existing implementation and conceptual mechanization.

venture.title: Venture begins
venture.content: My first effort to fund a company, Alwa. There are rewards from customer discovery, growth in business thinking and lessons on founder compatibility.

vogether.title: Have all basic techniques ready
vogether.content: A visually focus experimental project using the most updated tools, like Sketch, InVision, and Principles.

dodCornell.title: Product challenge with a multidisciplinary team!
dodCornell.content: A career-changing experience requiring me to step out of design comfort zone. From the collaboration with MBA, CS and CM students, I learned what a digital product needs to tackle beyond design.

coder.title: Intensive full-stack coding
